text:
 Alpha (α): Smoothing factor for the level.
 Beta (β): Smoothing factor for the trend.
 Trend Type: Additive or multiplicative.
 Dampen Type: Additive or multiplicative.
 Phi (φ): Damping coeﬃcient.
